channel.title: Andrew's Isentia challenge
channel.description: Recent content on Andrew's Isentia challenge

item.title: Your fortune at 2018-10-04T23:05:10+0000
item.description: You’re almost as happy as you think you are.

item.title: Your fortune at 2018-10-04T23:15:50+0000
item.description: You will gain money by an immoral action.

item.title: Your fortune at 2018-10-04T23:22:47+0000
item.description: All I know is what the words know, and dead things, and that makes a handsome little sum, with a beginning and a middle and an end, as in the well-built phrase and the long sonata of the dead. – Samuel Beckett

item.title: Your fortune at 2018-10-04T23:23:29+0000
item.description: Alimony and bribes will engage a large share of your wealth.

item.title: Your fortune at 2018-10-04T23:26:00+0000
item.description: I’ve touch’d the highest point of all my greatness; And from that full meridian of my glory I haste now to my setting. I shall fall, Like a bright exhalation in the evening And no man see me more. – Shakespeare

item.title: Your fortune at 2018-10-04T23:26:43+0000
item.description: Q: What do you call a principal female opera singer whose high C is lower than those of other principal female opera singers? A: A deep C diva.

item.title: Your fortune at 2018-10-04T23:26:53+0000
item.description: If two people love each other, there can be no happy end to it. – Ernest Hemingway

item.title: Your fortune at 2018-10-04T23:44:57+0000
item.description: Q: How do you stop an elephant from charging? A: Take away his credit cards.

item.title: Your fortune at 2018-10-04T23:50:05+0000
Your fortune at 2018-10-04T23:52:25+0000
Your fortune at 2018-10-04T23:53:01+0000
item.description: Good day to let down old friends who need help.

item.title: Your fortune at 2018-10-04T23:54:47+0000
item.description: Do what comes naturally. Seethe and fume and throw a tantrum.

item.title: Your fortune at 2018-10-05T00:04:01+0000
item.description: You have no real enemies.

item.title: Your fortune at 2018-10-05T04:44:38+0000
item.description: Someone is speaking well of you. How unusual!

item.title: Your fortune at 2018-10-05T05:24:35+0000
item.description: After all, all he did was string together a lot of old, well-known quotations. – H. L. Mencken, on Shakespeare

item.title: Your fortune at 2018-10-06T00:43:01+0000
item.description: Must I hold a candle to my shames? – William Shakespeare, “The Merchant of Venice”

item.title: Your fortune at 2018-10-06T00:53:01+0000
item.description: Wrinkles should merely indicate where smiles have been. – Mark Twain

item.title: Your fortune at 2018-10-06T01:03:01+0000
item.description: Be security conscious – National defense is at stake.

item.title: Your fortune at 2018-10-06T01:14:16+0000
item.description: Stay away from flying saucers today.

item.title: Your fortune at 2018-10-06T01:23:01+0000
item.description: Q: How many surrealists does it take to change a light bulb? A: Two, one to hold the giraffe, and the other to fill the bathtub with brightly colored machine tools. [Surrealist jokes just aren't my cup of fur. Ed.]

item.title: Your fortune at 2018-10-06T01:43:01+0000
item.description: Delores breezed along the surface of her life like a flat stone forever skipping along smooth water, rippling reality sporadically but oblivious to it consistently, until she finally lost momentum, sank, and due to an overdose of flouride as a child which caused her to suffer from chronic apathy, doomed herself to lie forever on the floor of her life as useless as an appendix and as lonely as a five-hundred pound barbell in a

item.title: Your fortune at 2018-10-06T01:53:01+0000
item.description: Never commit yourself! Let someone else commit you.

item.title: Your fortune at 2018-10-06T02:03:02+0000
item.description: If one cannot enjoy reading a book over and over again, there is no use in reading it at all. – Oscar Wilde

item.title: Your fortune at 2018-10-06T02:13:01+0000
item.description: You will experience a strong urge to do good; but it will pass.

item.title: Your fortune at 2018-10-06T02:23:01+0000
item.description: Q: What do they call the alphabet in Arkansas? A: The impossible dream.

item.title: Your fortune at 2018-10-06T02:43:01+0000
item.description: The time is right to make new friends.

item.title: Your fortune at 2018-10-06T02:53:01+0000
item.description: Delores breezed along the surface of her life like a flat stone forever skipping along smooth water, rippling reality sporadically but oblivious to it consistently, until she finally lost momentum, sank, and due to an overdose of flouride as a child which caused her to suffer from chronic apathy, doomed herself to lie forever on the floor of her life as useless as an appendix and as lonely as a five-hundred pound barbell in a

item.title: Your fortune at 2018-10-06T03:03:01+0000
item.description: Fortune: You will be attacked next Wednesday at 3:15 p.m. by six samurai sword wielding purple fish glued to Harley-Davidson motorcycles. Oh, and have a nice day! – Bryce Nesbitt ‘84

item.title: Your fortune at 2018-10-06T03:13:01+0000
item.description: It may or may not be worthwhile, but it still has to be done.

item.title: Your fortune at 2018-10-06T03:23:01+0000
item.description: Courage is resistance to fear, mastery of fear–not absence of fear. Except a creature be part coward it is not a compliment to say it is brave; it is merely a loose misapplication of the word. Consider the flea!–incomparably the bravest of all the creatures of God, if ignorance of fear were courage. Whether you are asleep or awake he will attack you, caring nothing for the fact that in bulk and strength you are to him as are the massed armies of the earth

item.title: Your fortune at 2018-10-06T03:43:01+0000
item.description: The holy passion of Friendship is of so sweet and steady and loyal and enduring a nature that it will last through a whole lifetime, if not asked to lend money. – Mark Twain, “Pudd’nhead Wilson’s Calendar”

item.title: Your fortune at 2018-10-06T03:53:01+0000
item.description: This is the first age that’s paid much attention to the future, which is a little ironic since we may not have one. – Arthur Clarke

item.title: Your fortune at 2018-10-06T04:03:01+0000
item.description: For the fashion of Minas Tirith was such that it was built on seven levels, each delved into a hill, and about each was set a wall, and in each wall was a gate. – J.R.R. Tolkien, “The Return of the King” [Quoted in "VMS Internals and Data Structures", V4.4, when referring to system overview.]

item.title: Your fortune at 2018-10-06T04:13:01+0000
item.description: You will be the last person to buy a Chrysler.

item.title: Your fortune at 2018-10-06T04:23:01+0000
item.description: Suspicion always haunts the guilty mind. – Wm. Shakespeare

item.title: Your fortune at 2018-10-06T04:43:01+0000
item.description: When in doubt, tell the truth. – Mark Twain

item.title: Your fortune at 2018-10-06T04:53:01+0000
item.description: Extreme fear can neither fight nor fly. – William Shakespeare, “The Rape of Lucrece”

item.title: Your fortune at 2018-10-06T05:03:02+0000
item.description: You are magnetic in your bearing.

item.title: Your fortune at 2018-10-06T05:13:01+0000
item.description: You can rent this space for only $5 a week.

item.title: Your fortune at 2018-10-06T05:23:02+0000
item.description: You will become rich and famous unless you don’t.

item.title: Your fortune at 2018-10-06T05:43:01+0000
item.description: Small things make base men proud. – William Shakespeare, “Henry VI”

item.title: Your fortune at 2018-10-06T05:53:01+0000
item.description: You had some happiness once, but your parents moved away, and you had to leave it behind.

item.title: Your fortune at 2018-10-06T06:03:01+0000
item.description: You will be successful in love.

item.title: Your fortune at 2018-10-06T06:13:01+0000
item.description: Q: What is orange and goes “click, click?” A: A ball point carrot.

item.title: Your fortune at 2018-10-06T06:23:01+0000
item.description: So she went into the garden to cut a cabbage leaf to make an apple pie; and at the same time a great she-bear, coming up the street pops its head into the shop. “What! no soap?” So he died, and she very imprudently married the barber; and there were present the Picninnies, and the Grand Panjandrum himself, with the little round button at top, and they all fell to playing the game of catch as catch can, till the gunpowder ran

item.title: Your fortune at 2018-10-06T06:43:01+0000
item.description: Your love life will be happy and harmonious.

item.title: Your fortune at 2018-10-06T06:53:01+0000
item.description: For there are moments when one can neither think nor feel. And if one can neither think nor feel, she thought, where is one? – Virginia Woolf, “To the Lighthouse” [Quoted in "VMS Internals and Data Structures", V4.4, when referring to powerfail recovery.]

item.title: Your fortune at 2018-10-06T07:03:01+0000
item.description: You have Egyptian flu: you’re going to be a mummy.

item.title: Your fortune at 2018-10-06T07:13:02+0000
item.description: Q: Why is it that the more accuracy you demand from an interpolation function, the more expensive it becomes to compute? A: That’s the Law of Spline Demand.

item.title: Your fortune at 2018-10-06T07:23:02+0000
item.description: Mind! I don’t mean to say that I know, of my own knowledge, what there is particularly dead about a door-nail. I might have been inclined, myself, to regard a coffin-nail as the deadest piece of ironmongery in the trade. But the wisdom of our ancestors is in the simile; and my unhallowed hands shall not disturb it, or the Country’s done for. You will therefore permit me to repeat, emphatically, that Marley was as dead as a door-nail.

item.title: Your fortune at 2018-10-06T07:43:01+0000
item.description: Perilous to all of us are the devices of an art deeper than we ourselves possess. – Gandalf the Grey [J.R.R. Tolkien, “Lord of the Rings”]

item.title: Your fortune at 2018-10-06T07:53:01+0000
item.description: You are only young once, but you can stay immature indefinitely.

item.title: Your fortune at 2018-10-06T08:03:01+0000
item.description: You worry too much about your job. Stop it. You are not paid enough to worry.

item.title: Your fortune at 2018-10-06T08:13:01+0000
item.description: You possess a mind not merely twisted, but actually sprained.

item.title: Your fortune at 2018-10-06T08:23:01+0000
item.description: Q: What does a WASP Mom make for dinner? A: A crisp salad, a hearty soup, a lovely entree, followed by a delicious dessert.

item.title: Your fortune at 2018-10-06T08:43:01+0000
item.description: Swerve me? The path to my fixed purpose is laid with iron rails, whereon my soul is grooved to run. Over unsounded gorges, through the rifled hearts of mountains, under torrents’ beds, unerringly I rush! – Captain Ahab, “Moby Dick”

item.title: Your fortune at 2018-10-06T08:53:01+0000
item.description: Man is the only animal that blushes – or needs to. – Mark Twain

item.title: Your fortune at 2018-10-06T09:03:02+0000
item.description: You will lose your present job and have to become a door to door mayonnaise salesman.

item.title: Your fortune at 2018-10-06T09:13:02+0000
item.description: They spell it “da Vinci” and pronounce it “da Vinchy”. Foreigners always spell better than they pronounce. – Mark Twain

item.title: Your fortune at 2018-10-06T09:23:01+0000
item.description: Tuesday is the Wednesday of the rest of your life.

item.title: Your fortune at 2018-10-06T09:43:01+0000
item.description: Q: What do you call a principal female opera singer whose high C is lower than those of other principal female opera singers? A: A deep C diva.

item.title: Your fortune at 2018-10-06T09:53:01+0000
item.description: You will attract cultured and artistic people to your home.

item.title: Your fortune at 2018-10-06T10:03:02+0000
item.description: This night methinks is but the daylight sick. – William Shakespeare, “The Merchant of Venice”

item.title: Your fortune at 2018-10-06T10:13:01+0000
item.description: There was a phone call for you.

item.title: Your fortune at 2018-10-06T10:23:01+0000
item.description: Your society will be sought by people of taste and refinement.

item.title: Your fortune at 2018-10-06T10:43:02+0000
item.description: The true Southern watermelon is a boon apart, and not to be mentioned with commoner things. It is chief of the world’s luxuries, king by the grace of God over all the fruits of the earth. When one has tasted it, he knows what the angels eat. It was not a Southern watermelon that Eve took; we know it because she repented. – Mark Twain, “Pudd’nhead Wilson’s Calendar”

item.title: Your fortune at 2018-10-06T10:53:01+0000
item.description: “I understand this is your first dead client,” Sabian was saying. The absurdity of the statement made me want to laugh but they don’t call me Deadpan Allie and lie. – Pat Cadigan, “Mindplayers”

item.title: Your fortune at 2018-10-06T11:03:01+0000
item.description: You will pioneer the first Martian colony.

item.title: Your fortune at 2018-10-06T11:13:01+0000
item.description: Your fly might be open (but don’t check it just now).

item.title: Your fortune at 2018-10-06T11:23:01+0000
item.description: There is always one thing to remember: writers are always selling somebody out. – Joan Didion, “Slouching Towards Bethlehem”

item.title: Your fortune at 2018-10-06T11:43:01+0000
item.description: Don’t go surfing in South Dakota for a while.

item.title: Your fortune at 2018-10-06T11:53:02+0000
item.description: Your lucky color has faded.

item.title: Your fortune at 2018-10-06T12:03:02+0000
item.description: Q: Why did the germ cross the microscope? A: To get to the other slide.

item.title: Your fortune at 2018-10-06T12:13:01+0000
item.description: You definitely intend to start living sometime soon.

item.title: Your fortune at 2018-10-06T12:23:02+0000
item.description: They have been at a great feast of languages, and stolen the scraps. – William Shakespeare, “Love’s Labour’s Lost”

item.title: Your fortune at 2018-10-06T12:43:01+0000
item.description: Many pages make a thick book.

item.title: Your fortune at 2018-10-06T12:53:01+0000
item.description: You have a deep appreciation of the arts and music.

item.title: Your fortune at 2018-10-06T13:03:01+0000
item.description: Make a wish, it might come true.

item.title: Your fortune at 2018-10-06T13:13:01+0000
item.description: AWAKE! FEAR! FIRE! FOES! AWAKE! FEAR! FIRE! FOES! AWAKE! AWAKE! – J. R. R. Tolkien

item.title: Your fortune at 2018-10-06T13:23:01+0000
item.description: You are so boring that when I see you my feet go to sleep.

item.title: Your fortune at 2018-10-06T13:43:01+0000
item.description: You have a will that can be influenced by all with whom you come in contact.
